ygData.subject: New to this list and tinkering..
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all I m new to this list and tho the art of tinkering. Could someoone point me to an hompage where i can read more about tinkering like wich books i need
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all



I'm new to this list and tho the art of tinkering. Could someoone point me to an hompage where i can read more about tinkering like wich books i need ( I need books on tinkering right ?) and outher stuff. also if there has been any good post to this list before and you have saved them i would be glad if you could mail them to me at zinken@...

I play on Veeshan as an lv 21 Gnome Wizzie named Askur, so if you play there give me an tell and say hi.


/Askur
